attributes.action: Say no to Western Military Intervention in Syria.
attributes.additional_details:
The UK and the US have threatened a "serious response" if it emerges Syria used chemical weapons last week.     To destabilise Syria even further by air strikes will have a ripple affect across the whole region.  Lebanon, Iraq and Jordan are already in a fragile state.
Work with our partners in the EU and in the UN to find a diplomatic solution to this crisis, do not resort to military force and regime change.
